## Scenario interface

Base interface of a Tryorama test scenario. Both [LocalScenario](./tryorama.localscenario.md) and [TryCpScenario](./tryorama.trycpscenario.md) implement this interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Scenario 
```
